Posts.Content: On Jan 28, 2013 1:39 PM Schultzie wrote: I will try anything, thanks for the advise.  I live in Maryland and I am finding if you work, you get nothing, if you live off the state you get everything.  Sends a message pay your taxes, live according to the rules and get screwd by the government.  Sorry my eyes have just been opened to many things. Sorry about your current situation. but saddened about statements that were leveled.  I have not worked in 7 months, but pay for COBRA which is extremely expensive.  As a SW in a hospital for over 24 years, your statements are totally incorrect.  Maybe that energy can be used to attempt to access assistance rather than exhibit misguided anger, and leveling false information.  Good luck in accessing assistance.
Posts.Title: financial help

Posts.Content: check your county hospital system; The Rose; National Cancer Society; Susan B.Komen Org.  This is unacceptable.  One has to be assertive, and agressive in demanding service.  This is unacceptable in America.  Someone will help you.
Posts.Title: HELP PLEASE!!!

Posts.Content: Where does your friend live?  I will assist in locating potential resources.
Posts.Title: HELP PLEASE!!!
